item.title: A gift from my wife
item.description: I love sparrows. For me, they are like good omen messengers, a call for a simple life, enjoying small things, and living at the moment. Look at the sparrows; they do not know what they will do in the next moment. Let us literally live from moment to moment. Mahatma Gandhi Thanks @cuaimelis for this little guy.
